de.iss.mv2.server

Interface ServerConstants

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MV2Constants

    public interface ServerConstants
extends MV2Constants
    Defines constants used by the MV2Server.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BC_CLASS_NAME
      The name of the BouncyCastleProvider-class.
      static java.lang.String BC_PATH_OPION
      An option to define the path to the Bouncy Castle Provider file.
      static java.lang.String BC_PROV_JAR
      The default name of the Bouncy Castle provider file.
      static java.lang.String BINDINGS_CONFIGURATION_FILE_NAME
      The name of the bindings configuration file.
      static java.lang.String CREATE_DB_OPTION
      The command line option to create the initial database structure.
      static java.lang.String CREATE_EXAMPLE_CONFIGURATION_OPTION
      The command line option to create an example configuration.
      static java.lang.String KEY_PASSPHRASE_OPTION
      The command line option to retrieve the passphrase of the private keys.
      static java.lang.String MV2_SERVER_IMPLEMENTATION_NAME
      The name of the current MV2 server implementation.
      static java.lang.String MV2_SERVER_IMPLEMENTATION_VERSION
      The version of the current MV2 server implementation.
      static java.lang.String READ_ONLY_CONFIGURATION_FILE_NAME
      The name of the ReadOnlyAccountsConfig.
      static java.lang.String RECRYPT_KEY_FILE_OPTION
      The command line option to change the encryption of a key file.
      static java.lang.String SERVER_CONFIGURATION_FILE_NAME
      The name of the server configuration file.
      static java.lang.String SHOW_INCOMING_MESSAGES_OPTION
      The command line option indicating that incoming messages should be printed to the console.
      static java.lang.String UNLIMIT_KEY_STRENGTH_OPTION
      The command line option to unlimit the key strength limitation.
